name: Pigment Farm
description:
In Pigment Farm you play as a young farmer girl who aspires to become a painter!
Grab your brush and run after colored pigs, pick up their colors and create beautiful paintings!

In this fun and challenging action game, you need to get the right colors for your painting's goals,
and these colors happen to be cute little pigmented pigs wallowing around your farm!

                    ᘛ( ▽・(oo)・▽) 

Pigs come in different pigmentations, the primary colors: yellow, magenta and cyan.
Mix them and you'll get secondary and tertiary colors.
But be carefull: too much mixing will get muddy!

Catch the correct pigs, mix the colors precisely and accomplish your paintings! 

FEATURES

- Original game mechanic and theme;
- Hand-to-eye coordination and coloring games combined;
- Easy to play with increasing difficulty;
- Fast-paced dynamic levels, slightly chaotic in a funny way;
- New mechanics as the game progresses;
- Original soundtrack and characters.


TEAM

Game Design: Kevin Zanluchi; Yuri Morroni
Programming: Kevin Zanluchi
Art: Yuri Morroni
Sound: Caio Paifer

This game was made within 30 days for the 11th "Maratona de Jogos", organized by Academia de Produção de Jogos.
